pr_title: Move ObjectSerializer and JsonSerializer into Azure Core

timeline.message: Move ObjectSerializer and JsonSerializer into Azure Core, dropped JsonNode work from what is going into Core, Experimental extends Core JsonSerializer with JsonNode methods

timeline.bodyText: Why it is still needed in core-experiemental?
timeline.author: sima-zhu
timeline.diffHunk:

replies.bodyText: There is still prototyped work for JsonSerializer that cannot move into Azure Core, yet/ever (may never do it). I could rename the JsonSerializer in Azure Core Experimental to JsonSerializerExtensions to make it less confusing.
replies.author: alzimmermsft
